attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement for a driver to stop & report cats being run down.
attributes.additional_details: I want the legislation changed to prosecute dangerous and careless drivers who run down cats and who also don't report it, I know this has been argued before however, it is happening now more than ever, this needs to change. Also I belive signs should be put up on roads, to warn drivers of cats.
attributes.background: Cats are being run over on a regular bases on our roads, this needs to stop, accidents happen however many people don't report it, or there is no investigation into what happend, this needs to change, a cat is a family and deserves to the right treatment and justice if wrongly run down.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Protect Cats: Make Reporting Cat Accidents a Legal Requirement
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700990
